fmea_entries.failure_mode: Approves strategy that actually violates user's plan
fmea_entries.effect: User follows invalid path; regulatory breach
fmea_entries.cause: Incomplete or outdated coverage criteria in memory
fmea_entries.recommended_action: Add multi-source RAG and enforce timestamp threshold

fmea_entries.failure_mode: Rejects a valid strategy as noncompliant
fmea_entries.effect: User is denied a service they should be eligible for
fmea_entries.cause: Policy logic is over-constrained or misinterpreted
fmea_entries.current_controls: Regulatory exception matcher and justification log
fmea_entries.recommended_action: Add semantic similarity layer to detect alternate eligibility phrasing

fmea_entries.failure_mode: Misses updates or fetches misaligned policy info
fmea_entries.recommended_action: Build live CMS endpoint monitor to push index updates automatically

fmea_entries.failure_mode: Valid plan is marked rejected (or vice versa)
fmea_entries.cause: Misformatted or flipped flag; logic bug
fmea_entries.recommended_action: Require consistency between flag and textual explanation

fmea_entries.failure_mode: Fails to send rejection result back to Strategy Agent
fmea_entries.effect: Loop stalls, system breaks or passes error downstream
fmea_entries.current_controls: Retry trigger threshold and fallback timer
fmea_entries.recommended_action: Add explicit fail path node and result delivery validation
